sentences.en: Then he lifted his shirt to reveal a heavy, boxlike device dangling from his neck.
sentences.cn: 说完之后，他掀开他的衣领，露出一个悬挂在他脖子上的沉重的，盒子样的装置。

sentences.en: These modern boxlike buildings do violence to the beauty of the old city.
sentences.cn: 这些现代的盒式建筑破坏了古城的美丽市容.

sentences.en: William M. Clark, a retired businessman, generously provided a collection of engines, levers, pumps, axles, and crankshafts for us to display in boxlike frames.
sentences.cn: 一位退休的商人William M.Clark慷慨的为我们提供了一系列的引擎，撬杠，水泵，轴和机轴来帮助我们在盒子一样的框架里面展示。

words.tran_cn: 拳击；装箱；围模；做箱的材料
